qas.question: Which lake is the cities largest lake?

context: Walking trails line Lake Hefner and Lake Overholser in the northwest part of the city and downtown at the canal and the Oklahoma River. The majority of the east shore area is taken up by parks and trails, including a new leashless dog park and the postwar-era Stars and Stripes Park. <a0_0>Lake Stanley Draper<a0_0/> is the city's largest and most remote lake.
